CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 18, 1952, p. 3, reads: "Homestead Physician to be Honored - Dr. Harry M. Hargrave, who has practiced medicine in Homestead for forty-eight years, will be the honor guest at a banquet there Friday, Oct. 24. - Harris Photo."Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1962, pg. 2, reads: "Nonagenarian - Dr. Harry M. Hargrave, 90 years old, of Homestead, is one of that borough's most respected and beloved citizens.  For 57 years he served the community well and faithfully in the field of general practice.  Now in retirement, he can look back with a feeling of satisfaction because of a job well done."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Dr. Harry M. Hargrave posed with book in interior with pressed wainscoting
